00034 /*
00035  * $Log$
00036  * Revision 1.4  2008/08/11 06:59:11  haraldkipp
00037  * BSD types replaced by stdint types (feature request #1282721).
00038  *
00039  * Revision 1.3  2008/07/26 09:43:01  haraldkipp
00040  * Added support for retrieving and setting the interrupt mode.
00041  *
00042  * Revision 1.2  2006/09/29 12:36:02  haraldkipp
00043  * Default interrupt priority changed from 4 to 5. Usually this is used for
00044  * high speed links.
00045  *
00046  * Revision 1.1  2006/09/05 12:33:45  haraldkipp
00047  * SSC interrupt handler added.
00048  *
00049  */
00050 
00051 #include <arch/arm.h>
00052 #include <dev/irqreg.h>
00053 
00054 #ifndef NUT_IRQPRI_SSC
00055 #define NUT_IRQPRI_SSC  5
00056 #endif
00057 
00058 static int SyncSerialIrqCtl(int cmd, void *param);
00059 
00060 IRQ_HANDLER sig_SSC = {
00061 #ifdef NUT_PERFMON
00062     0,                  /* Interrupt counter, ir_count. */
00063 #endif
00064     NULL,               /* Passed argument, ir_arg. */
00065     NULL,               /* Handler subroutine, ir_handler. */
00066     SyncSerialIrqCtl    /* Interrupt control, ir_ctl. */
00067 };
00068 
00072 static void SyncSerialIrqEntry(void) __attribute__ ((naked));
00073 void SyncSerialIrqEntry(void)
00074 {
00075     IRQ_ENTRY();
00076 #ifdef NUT_PERFMON
00077     sig_SSC.ir_count++;
00078 #endif
00079     if (sig_SSC.ir_handler) {
00080         (sig_SSC.ir_handler) (sig_SSC.ir_arg);
00081     }
00082     IRQ_EXIT();
00083 }
00084 
00102 static int SyncSerialIrqCtl(int cmd, void *param)
00103 {
00104     int rc = 0;
00105     unsigned int *ival = (unsigned int *)param;
00106     int_fast8_t enabled = inr(AIC_IMR) & _BV(SSC_ID);
00107 
00108     /* Disable interrupt. */
00109     if (enabled) {
00110         outr(AIC_IDCR, _BV(SSC_ID));
00111     }
00112 
00113     switch(cmd) {
00114     case NUT_IRQCTL_INIT:
00115         /* Set the vector. */
00116         outr(AIC_SVR(SSC_ID), (unsigned int)SyncSerialIrqEntry);
00117         /* Initialize to edge triggered with defined priority. */
00118         outr(AIC_SMR(SSC_ID), AIC_SRCTYPE_INT_EDGE_TRIGGERED | NUT_IRQPRI_SSC);
00119         /* Clear interrupt */
00120         outr(AIC_ICCR, _BV(SSC_ID));
00121         break;
00122     case NUT_IRQCTL_STATUS:
00123         if (enabled) {
00124             *ival |= 1;
00125         }
00126         else {
00127             *ival &= ~1;
00128         }
00129         break;
00130     case NUT_IRQCTL_ENABLE:
00131         enabled = 1;
00132         break;
00133     case NUT_IRQCTL_DISABLE:
00134         enabled = 0;
00135         break;
00136     case NUT_IRQCTL_GETMODE:
00137         {
00138             unsigned int val = inr(AIC_SMR(SSC_ID)) & AIC_SRCTYPE;
00139             if (val == AIC_SRCTYPE_INT_LEVEL_SENSITIVE || val == AIC_SRCTYPE_EXT_HIGH_LEVEL) {
00140                 *ival = NUT_IRQMODE_LEVEL;
00141             } else  {
00142                 *ival = NUT_IRQMODE_EDGE;
00143             }
00144         }
00145         break;
00146     case NUT_IRQCTL_SETMODE:
00147         if (*ival == NUT_IRQMODE_LEVEL) {
00148             outr(AIC_SMR(SSC_ID), (inr(AIC_SMR(SSC_ID)) & ~AIC_SRCTYPE) | AIC_SRCTYPE_INT_LEVEL_SENSITIVE);
00149         } else if (*ival == NUT_IRQMODE_EDGE) {
00150             outr(AIC_SMR(SSC_ID), (inr(AIC_SMR(SSC_ID)) & ~AIC_SRCTYPE) | AIC_SRCTYPE_INT_EDGE_TRIGGERED);
00151         } else  {
00152             rc = -1;
00153         }
00154         break;
00155     case NUT_IRQCTL_GETPRIO:
00156         *ival = inr(AIC_SMR(SSC_ID)) & AIC_PRIOR;
00157         break;
00158     case NUT_IRQCTL_SETPRIO:
00159         outr(AIC_SMR(SSC_ID), (inr(AIC_SMR(SSC_ID)) & ~AIC_PRIOR) | *ival);
00160         break;
00161 #ifdef NUT_PERFMON
00162     case NUT_IRQCTL_GETCOUNT:
00163         *ival = (unsigned int)sig_SSC.ir_count;
00164         sig_SSC.ir_count = 0;
00165         break;
00166 #endif
00167     default:
00168         rc = -1;
00169         break;
00170     }
00171 
00172     /* Enable interrupt. */
00173     if (enabled) {
00174         outr(AIC_IECR, _BV(SSC_ID));
00175     }
00176     return rc;
00177 }
